Counts

Source: R/AllGenerics.R, R/counts-methods.R
counts.Rd

Count matrix.

counts(object, ...)

counts(object, ...) <- value

# S4 method for SummarizedExperiment
counts(object)

# S4 method for SummarizedExperiment,matrix
counts(object) <- value

# S4 method for SummarizedExperiment,Matrix
counts(object) <- value

Arguments

object

Object.
value

Value to assign.
...

Additional arguments.

Value

Matrix. Typically matrix or Matrix class.

Note

For a SummarizedExperiment object, "counts" must be explicitly defined in assayNames.

Updated 2019-12-04.

Examples

data(RangedSummarizedExperiment, package = "AcidTest")

## SummarizedExperiment ====
object <- RangedSummarizedExperiment
x <- counts(object)
summary(x)
